replies.author: Adam
replies.text: Imagine a president who let four men die in Benghazi after calling fir help 600 times! Imagine accidentally letting 1800 plus immigrants who were set to be deported get citizenship! Imagine losing $6 Billion US money while over the State Department! Imagine selling 20% of our Uranium stock pile to Russia and earring $125 million for your self. Imagine destroying 30,000 emails after a government subpoena and lying about it! Imagine using a non secured email server to conduct secret and top secret information that could and has put our country at risk! Imagine lying about the lies you told regarding all of the above! AND THIS IS JUST THE ICING ON THE CAKE!
